titleStmt.title: An ansvver to a lawless pamphlet entituled, The petition and articles exhibited in Parliament against Doctor Haywood, late chaplain to the Bishop of Canterbury. By R.M.
titleStmt.author: R. M.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. N. for Henry Seile, at the Tygres head in Fleetstreet, over against Saint Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: A response to: The petition and articles exhibited in Parliament against Doctor Haywood, late chaplain to the Bishop of Canterbury.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
